scripts.test: npm run lint && echo "Error: no test specified" && exit 1
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && mkdir -p build/js && node_modules/.bin/browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/js/index.js -o build/js/app.js
scripts.build:css: if [ "$NODE_ENV" == "production" ]; then npm run scss; else npm run scss-dev; fi && npm run autoprefix
scripts.build:css:watch: onchange -v 'src/scss/**/*' -- npm run scss && npm run autoprefix
scripts.build: npm run clean -s && npm run build:js -s && npm run build:css -s && npm run build:images -s
scripts.build:watch: parallelshell 'npm run build:js:watch -s' 'npm run build:css:watch -s' 'npm run build:images:watch -s'
